title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 10 - BROKERS, DEALERS AND SALESPERSONS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 10 - BROKERS, DEALERS AND SALESPERSONS
State Regulations
§ 10.1 - Registration of securities broker-dealers, issuers, and salespersons; effective date
§ 10.2 - Central registration for FINRA member broker-dealers and salespersons of FINRA members
§ 10.3 - Supplemental broker-dealer statements for non-FINRA members
§ 10.4 - Supplemental salesperson's statement for salespersons employed by a non-FINRA member firm
§ 10.5 - Fee for supplemental statements
§ 10.6 - Alternative method of filing supplemental salesperson's and broker-dealer statements and fees attendant thereto
§ 10.7 - Annual renewal for FINRA member broker-dealers
§ 10.8 - Filing fees
§ 10.9 - Filing time limit
§ 10.10 - Definitions
§ 10.11 - Alternative method of filing for certain dealers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 10

Statutory authority: General Business Law, art. 23-A; §
359-e

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
